attr.title: Gauge Of Rage
attr.desc: Gauge Of Rage is a frantic and gory arcade style top down shooter that challenges you to build up and unleash your rage against a never ending onslaught of undead!
attr.desc_md:
Gauge Of Rage is a frantic and gory arcade style top down shooter that challenges you to build up and unleash your rage against a never ending onslaught of undead!
Note: Requires Twin Sticks!
attr.inst: Claim the game from steam. Download it and copy the game files to ports/gaugeofrage/gamedata.
attr.inst_md:
Claim the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/917870/Gauge_Of_Rage/. 
Download the game, copy over all the game files to ports/gaugeofrage/gamedata.
